copy.signIn: Sign in with your credentials to pick up exactly where your team left off.
copy.signUp: Create your Lumiso account to unlock collaborative workflows and beautiful client experiences.
copy.verify: We emailed you a confirmation link. Verify it to activate your workspace.
copy.recovery: Create a new password to get back into your account.
copy.recoveryRequest: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.

verification.title: Confirm your email to continue
verification.sentTo: We sent a verification link to {{email}}.
verification.copyBefore: We sent the verification link to

steps.inboxDesc: Look for the message from Lumiso with your confirmation link.
steps.confirmDesc: Click “Confirm email” so we can activate your account securely.
steps.returnDesc: Once confirmed, sign in with your new credentials.

actions.readySubtitle: After you approve the email, sign in with the password you just set.

spamWarning.title: Check spam or junk folders
spamWarning.description: Providers sometimes misplace verification emails. Look in Spam/Junk (Gmail TR may show 'Gereksiz') before resending.

features.title: Stay organized from day one
features.description: Use a short onboarding guide to define your clients, shoot types, and packages. The to-do list walks you through every step so you never miss a critical setting.

features.title: Send the right message at the right time
features.description: Define pre-shoot briefings, prep lists, and thank-you notes once. Templates and workflows reach your clients automatically so you don't have to chase every touchpoint.

features.title: Keep your shoot schedule crystal clear
features.description: See every session and reminder in day, week, or month view at a glance. Planning shoots, delivery dates, and to-dos becomes much easier.

profileIntake.title: Tell us about your studio
profileIntake.subtitle: We use these basics for outgoing emails and upcoming defaults—no onboarding tricks, just accurate info.

name.title: What's your preferred name?
name.description: We'll use this on dashboards, emails, and templates so everything feels personal.

business.title: What should we call your business?
business.description: This appears in invoices, email signatures, and future client portals.

projects.title: Pick the work you shoot most
projects.description: We use this to scaffold default project types and tune your defaults—pick every service you offer; your first pick becomes the default for new projects.

displayName.label: Preferred display name
displayName.placeholder: e.g. Tayte or Tayte from Lumiso Studios
displayName.helper: Shown in emails, notifications, and collaborator menus.

businessName.label: Business name
businessName.helper: Appears on invoices, emails, and future client portals.

projectTypes.label: Which projects do you shoot most?
projectTypes.managementHint: Need another category? Head to Settings → Projects & Sessions anytime to edit or add more.

footers.name: Update your preferred name anytime from Settings → Profile.
footers.business: Tweak your business identity under Settings → General.
footers.projects: Adjust your default project types in Settings → Projects & Sessions.

profileIntake.footer: You can update these anytime from Settings → General.

errors.displayName: Tell us how we should refer to you.
errors.businessName: Add the name you share with clients.
errors.projectTypes: Choose at least one project type.

toast.error: We couldn't save your preferences. Try again?

leads.title: Lead Management
leads.description: Manage and track all your potential clients

emptyState.title: Track every inquiry from one place

leads.noLeadsAllStatuses: No leads found. Add your first lead to get started!
leads.noLeadsWithFilters: No leads match your current filters.

export.successDescription: Your filtered leads have been downloaded.
export.errorDescription: We couldn't generate the Excel file. Please try again.
export.noDataDescription: Adjust your filters or search to include at least one lead.

leads.noOptionsConfigured: No options configured for this field

totalLeads.title: Total clients
totalLeads.tooltip: Counts every client in your workspace. The badge shows how many new clients were added this week compared with the previous week.
totalLeads.trendAria: New clients changed by {{delta}} compared with last week ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

conversionRate.title: Conversion rate
conversionRate.tooltip: Share of clients contacted in the last 30 days that moved to a booked or completed status. Compared to the prior 30-day period.
conversionRate.trendAria: Conversion rate changed by {{delta}} compared with the previous 30 days ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

noActivity.title: No recent activity
noActivity.tooltip: Clients with no updates in the last 14 days, excluding those marked as completed or lost. Follow up to keep your pipeline healthy.
noActivity.trendAria: Inactive clients changed by {{delta}} compared with the previous week ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

lost.title: Lost / closed
lost.tooltip: Clients moved into a final status such as completed or lost during the last 30 days. Useful for tracking closed outcomes.
lost.trendAria: Lost or closed clients changed by {{delta}} compared with the previous 30 days ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

inactiveFilter.label: Show inactive (14+ days)
inactiveFilter.description: Only show leads whose last update was at least 14 days ago and aren't completed or lost.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lead Management
welcome.description: Watch the 2-minute tour or skim the quick highlights below.

video.title: 2-minute quick tour
video.caption: See how to use the key cards, filters, and sorts.

trackLeads.title: Track Leads
trackLeads.description: See every lead in one organized table with contact and status.

filterSort.title: Filter & Sort
filterSort.description: Filter by status or fields and sort any column in seconds.

customizeColumns.title: Monitor Key Cards
customizeColumns.description: See new, conversion, and inactive cards at a glance.

addFirstLead.title: Add Your First Lead
addFirstLead.description: Now let's add your first lead! Click the 'Add Lead' button (or + icon on mobile) in the top right corner to get started.
addFirstLead.disabledTooltip: Add at least 1 lead to continue

exploreDetails.title: Great! Now Let's Explore Lead Details
exploreDetails.description: Perfect! Now that you have a lead, let's see what you can do with it. Click on your lead in the table below to view its detailed information.
exploreDetails.disabledTooltip: Click on your lead to continue

scheduling.title: Schedule Your First Photo Session
scheduling.description: Let's walk through scheduling a photo session for your client. This process will help you organize your photography workflow.

chooseDateTime.title: Choose Date & Time
chooseDateTime.description: Pick a convenient time that works for both you and your client.

selectClient.title: Select Your Client
selectClient.description: Choose the lead/client you want to photograph from your list.

addDetails.title: Add Session Details
addDetails.description: Include notes, special requirements, and optional project association.

selectLeadForSession.title: Select a Lead to Schedule Session
selectLeadForSession.description: Great! Now click on one of your leads in the table below to open their details page where you can schedule a session.
selectLeadForSession.disabledTooltip: Click on a lead to continue

messages.tutorialCompleted: Lead tutorial completed! Step 2 completed, navigating back to getting-started
messages.failedToSaveProgress: Failed to save progress. Please try again.
messages.columnPreferencesError: Failed to save column preferences. Please try again.

tooltips.projectRequired: Create a project first to continue
tooltips.viewProject: Click on your project to continue
tooltips.completedStatus: System status: marks the lead as won/completed and closes open work.
tooltips.lostStatus: System status: marks the lead as lost/closed and stops follow-ups.

projects.label: Projects
projects.hint: Convert this lead into a project to get started.

payments.label: Payments
payments.secondaryZero: Track budgets and invoices once projects are created.

sessions.label: Sessions
sessions.hint: Schedule a session to keep things moving.

activity.label: Activity
activity.hint: Updates will appear here as you work on this lead.
activity.info: Activity reflects the most recent changes across lead details, projects, sessions, and notes.

messages.projectsShortcut: You can access all your projects anytime from the Projects page in the sidebar!
messages.sessionAdded: Your session has been added to your calendar and you can find it in the Calendar page!

intro.title: Welcome to Lead Details! 📋
intro.description: Manage everything about this lead here. Quick look at what you can do:

sections.title: Client Information
sections.description: View or edit contact details, notes, and status.

sections.title: Projects Section
sections.description: Convert leads into projects with timelines and deliverables.

sections.title: Activity Timeline
sections.description: See interactions and updates across every touchpoint.

createProject.title: Create Your First Project
createProject.description: Click the “Add Project” button to create a new project.
createProject.descriptionMobile: Tap the “New Project” button to create a new project.
createProject.disabledTooltip: For this step, create the project first.

projectVideo.title: Watch How to Create a Project
projectVideo.description: Quick walkthrough before you start — watch the tutorial to see the exact steps for setting up a project for this lead.
projectVideo.placeholder: Add your tutorial video link in VITE_PROJECT_TUTORIAL_VIDEO_URL to show it here.

exploreProjects.title: Now Explore Your Project Features
exploreProjects.description: Open your project and look around. When you're ready, press Next to continue.
exploreProjects.disabledTooltip: Click on your project to continue

complete.title: 🎉 Congratulations! Tutorial Complete!
complete.description: Amazing work! You've mastered the fundamentals—from creating leads and converting them to projects, to managing client details and tracking progress.
complete.projectsShortcut: You can access all your projects anytime from the Projects page in the sidebar!

scheduleSession.title: Schedule Your Photo Session
scheduleSession.description: Let’s schedule a photo session for this client. Click “Schedule Session” below to open the form.

sections.title: Session Scheduling
sections.description: Choose a date and time that works for both you and your client.

sections.title: Calendar Integration
sections.description: Sessions automatically sync with your calendar for effortless planning.

sessionVideo.title: Watch how to schedule a session
sessionVideo.description: Quick walkthrough before you open the planner - see how to pick a time and add details.
sessionVideo.placeholder: Add your tutorial video URL to show it here.

sessionScheduled.title: 🎉 Session Scheduled Successfully!
sessionScheduled.description: Excellent! Your session is on the calendar and visible in your session timeline here.
sessionScheduled.banner: Your session has been added to your calendar and you can find it in the Calendar page!
tips: Sessions appear in your lead's activity timeline
Update session status as you progress
Associate sessions with projects for better organization

payments.label: Payments
payments.secondaryZero: Set a base price to track payments

services.label: Services

dialogs.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the project and all associated data including sessions, todos, and payments.

onboardingModal.title: Explore your project workspace

placeholder.content: Project details content will be displayed here using existing components.

localization.title: Localization
localization.subtitle: Manage languages and translations for your application

alert.title: Translation Workflow:
alert.description: Download existing files, translate them in your preferred tool, and upload the updated files back.
alert.proTipsDescription: Use translation tools like Crowdin, Weblate, or even Google Translate for bulk translations. Always test your translations in the app after uploading to ensure proper formatting.

steps.title: Download
steps.description: Download the translation file(s) you want to work with. Choose individual files or complete language packs.

steps.title: Translate
steps.description: Edit the JSON files using any text editor or translation tool. Maintain the structure and only change the values.

steps.title: Upload
steps.description: Upload the modified files back to the system. The changes will be validated and applied.

languagesTable.title: Available Languages
languagesTable.description: Configure which languages are available in your application

table.title: Translation Keys
table.description: Manage translation keys and their values across languages
table.emptySearch: No translation keys match your search.

autoDetect.label: Auto-detect browser language
autoDetect.description: Automatically set user language based on browser settings

threshold.label: Translation progress threshold
threshold.description: Minimum percentage of translations required to show a language

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Project Management Hub
welcome.description: Watch the 2-minute tour or skim the quick highlights below.
welcome.subtitle: A fast tour of the three views you'll use most:

video.title: 2-minute quick tour
video.caption: See Board, List, and Archived in action.

welcome.boardView: Board: Drag and drop your workflow.
welcome.listView: List: Table view for details and sorting.

exploreViews.title: Explore Different Views
exploreViews.description: Let's try out the different view modes. Click between Board, List, and Archived views to see how each one works.
exploreViews.subtitle: 💡 Each view serves a different purpose to help you stay organized and efficient across your projects.
exploreViews.tip: Try moving a project between different stages in board view!

completion.title: Perfect! You're Ready to Manage Projects
completion.description: You've mastered the project management interface. Now you can efficiently organize your photography business using these powerful views.

messages.tutorialCompleted: Projects tutorial completed! Navigating to next step.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: View your scheduled sessions and reminders

video.title: See how Calendar works
video.description: Watch a quick overview to get the most out of your schedule.

emptyStates.noSessions: No sessions scheduled for this day
emptyStates.enableFilters: Enable sessions or reminders in the filters above

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your photo sessions and appointments

video.title: See how Sessions works
video.description: Watch a quick overview to make the most of your session list.

export.successDescription: Your filtered sessions have been downloaded.
export.errorDescription: We couldn't generate the Excel file. Please try again.
export.noDataDescription: Adjust your filters to include at least one session.

pastNeedsAction.title: Past sessions needing action
pastNeedsAction.tooltip: Counts sessions scheduled before today that remain in a Planned or initial Active lifecycle so you can follow up.

schedule.title: Today & upcoming sessions
schedule.tooltip: Combines today's non-cancelled sessions with future bookings so you can see everything happening next.

inProgress.title: Sessions in progress
inProgress.tooltip: Counts sessions currently mapped to an Active lifecycle, even if no schedule time is stored.

completed.title: Completed sessions
completed.tooltip: Counts sessions mapped to the Completed lifecycle. The weekly chip tracks sessions whose date falls this week.

segmentDetails.lifecycleNotice: Lifecycle mapping follows your session status configuration.

all.tooltip: Combines Upcoming, In progress, and Pending so you can monitor every open session.
bullets: Groups Upcoming, In progress, and Pending sessions together.
Counts statuses mapped to Planned or Active lifecycles (not Completed or Cancelled).
Lifecycle mapping stays synced with your session status settings.

upcoming.tooltip: Sessions scheduled for today or later while still in a Planned lifecycle (or initial Active status).
upcoming.summary: {{total}} sessions scheduled for today or later.
bullets: Lifecycle is Planned or an initial Active state.
Date is today or in the future; overdue planned sessions move to Pending.
Lifecycle mapping uses the statuses you configure.

in_progress.tooltip: Sessions whose lifecycle is Active and already underway.
in_progress.summary: {{total}} sessions currently in an Active lifecycle.
bullets: Lifecycle is Active and no longer in the initial Planned phase.
Ideal for shoots or appointments that are underway.
Lifecycle mapping uses the statuses you configure.

pending.tooltip: Sessions with a past date that are still in a Planned or initial Active lifecycle.
pending.summary: {{total}} sessions are overdue but still planned.
bullets: Lifecycle remains Planned or in its initial Active state.
Use this view to follow up and advance the lifecycle.

past.tooltip: Sessions marked with a lifecycle of Completed.
bullets: Covers delivered or closed-out sessions regardless of date.
Lifecycle mapping uses the statuses you configure.

cancelled.tooltip: Sessions mapped to a lifecycle of Cancelled.
bullets: Includes no-shows, client cancellations, and archived sessions.
Lifecycle mapping uses the statuses you configure.

emptyState.title: No sessions found
emptyState.description: Try adjusting your filters to find sessions

video.title: See how Reminders works
video.description: Watch a quick overview to make the most of your reminders.

emptyState.title: No reminders found
emptyState.description: You don't have any reminders for the selected filter

timeline.completedDescription: Items you've marked as done stay here for quick reference.

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Customize your brand appearance across client-facing materials
branding.businessNameHelp: This will appear on invoices, contracts, and client communications
branding.businessEmailHelp: Used for client communications and appears on invoices
branding.businessPhoneHelp: Optional contact number for client communications
branding.deleteLogoConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your logo? This action cannot be undone.
branding.brandColorHelp: Appears on client emails, automated reminders, and CTA buttons. Click the color preview to open the picker or type a valid hex value (e.g., #1EB29F).
branding.brandColorHelpAlt: Used in client-facing UI and outgoing messages. Must be a valid hex color (e.g., #1EB29F)
branding.company_name_help: Your business name as it appears to clients

regional.title: Regional Settings

language.title: Language

businessInfo.title: Business Information & Branding
businessInfo.description: Intake already filled these fields—use this page to refine public details, add social channel links, and give the pre-configured regional settings a quick look.
businessInfo.setBusinessName: Review or adjust your studio name
businessInfo.help: Business info, social channels, and regional settings appear on every client touchpoint—give them a quick look.

addBusinessName.title: Verify your business identity
addBusinessName.description: We already saved your studio name—use this step to confirm it, drop in social links, and glance at the timezone/date settings we prepared.
addBusinessName.required: Enter or confirm your business name to enable Next (pre-filled from intake).
addBusinessName.appearsOn: Feeds Social Channels plus every invoice, contract, and email.
addBusinessName.canChange: Branding, social links, and regional settings stay editable anytime.

setupComplete.title: 🎉 Business Setup Complete!
setupComplete.description: Great work! Your business information is ready, and you're clear to continue the guided setup.

profileInfo.title: Profile Information
profileInfo.description: Update your personal information and photo.
profileInfo.defaultAvatarHelp: Used in admin views and client messages
profileInfo.defaultAvatarLongHelp: Used in admin views and client messages when no photo is uploaded
profileInfo.fileFormatsHelp: Used in admin views and client messages. Accepts JPG, PNG, SVG. Max file size: 2 MB
profileInfo.fullNameHelp: Your full name as it will appear in client communications
profileInfo.phoneNumberHelp: Your contact number for scheduling and client communications
profileInfo.emailHelp: Your login email address (cannot be changed here)
profileInfo.deletePhotoConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile photo? This action cannot be undone.

security.title: Password & security
security.description: Send yourself a secure password reset link whenever you need to update your credentials.
security.hint: We email a one-time link to your login address. It expires after 60 minutes for your safety.
security.successDescription: Check {{email}} for the secure link to set a new password.
security.errorDescription: Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
security.missingEmailDescription: We couldn't find your login email. Refresh the page or sign in again, then try once more.

workingHours.title: Working Hours

workingHours.helpText: These hours will be used as defaults when scheduling sessions

businessInfo.title: General settings already have your studio name

deleteData.title: Delete All Data
deleteData.description: Permanently remove all your data from our servers
deleteData.warningDesc: This action will permanently delete all of your leads, projects, sessions, reminders, payments, and associated data. This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost forever.

deleteData.deleteCompleteDesc: All your data has been permanently deleted.

highlights.reviewPackages: Review and customize the default packages

reviewTemplates.title: Review Your Package Templates
reviewTemplates.description: We've created some default photography packages for you. You can modify, delete, or keep them as they are. Click on any package to edit its details.
reviewTemplates.tip: Tip: You can edit package names, descriptions, and what's included

setPricing.title: Set Your Package Pricing
setPricing.description: Add or update pricing for your packages to streamline your client proposals and booking process.
setPricing.tip: Remember: You can always adjust prices later for individual projects

configureServices.title: Configure Your Services
configureServices.description: Review and customize the individual services that make up your packages. These are the building blocks you'll use when creating packages.
configureServices.tip: Services can be reused across multiple packages

complete.title: 🎉 Packages Setup Complete!
complete.description: Excellent! You've successfully configured your photography packages and services. Your business is now ready to create professional proposals and manage bookings.

clientMessaging.title: Client Messaging
clientMessaging.description: Manage automated message templates and delivery triggers for client communication

silentHours.title: Silent Hours
silentHours.description: Messages will not be sent during this time window. Any messages triggered at night will be delayed until the next morning.
silentHours.enabledDesc: Messages triggered during silent hours will be delayed until the next morning
silentHours.disabledDesc: When disabled, messages will be sent immediately regardless of the time of day
silentHours.helpText: Messages triggered between {{startTime}} and {{endTime}} will be sent after silent hours end.

export.successDescription: Your filtered payments have been downloaded.

buttons.restartConfirm: Start over? This will discard your unsaved edits.

onboarding.lockedDescription: Add your first lead to unlock project and session creation.

getting_started.welcome_subtitle: Let's set up your photography business step by step
getting_started.learning_path_subtitle: Ready to go in about 10 minutes—just follow the steps.

step_1.title: Create Your First Lead
step_1.description: Add your first lead to start tracking clients.

step_2.title: Set Up a Photography Project
step_2.description: Convert a lead into a project to organize sessions and deliverables.

step_3.title: Explore Projects Page
step_3.description: Learn about different project views: Board, List, and Archived projects

step_4.title: Schedule a Photo Session
step_4.description: Schedule your first session and organize your calendar.

step_5.title: Configure Your Packages
step_5.description: Set up your photo packages and pricing.

toast.setup_started: Let's get you set up step by step.

sample_data.title: Before you skip the checklist
sample_data.description: Stay in guided setup or end the tutorial and move forward your way.
sample_data.choice_title: How would you like to continue?
sample_data.choice_description: Pick sample data or start clean, then we’ll exit the tutorial.
sample_data.path_continue_description: Finish the guided checklist to lock in your settings with our prompts.
sample_data.path_skip_description: End the tutorial now and pick between sample data or a clean slate.
sample_data.selection_hint: If you choose to exit, pick how you want to explore.
sample_data.select_option_tooltip: Select an option to choose how you want to start.

sample.title: Explore with sample data
sample.description: Dive in with ready-made leads, projects, and sessions.

clean.title: Clean workspace
clean.description: Skip the checklist and create everything yourself.

sample_leads.description: Pre-filled client leads with realistic contact information

example_projects.title: Example projects

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Project Management Hub
welcome.description: Let's explore the three powerful ways to view and organize your photography projects.
welcome.subtitle: In this tutorial, you'll master streamlined project management built for creative studios:
welcome.boardView: Board View - Visual workflow management with drag & drop
welcome.listView: List View - Detailed table with sorting and filtering
welcome.archivedView: Archived View - Completed projects for reference

exploreViews.title: Explore Different Views
exploreViews.description: Click between Board, List, and Archived views to see how each one works.
exploreViews.subtitle: 💡 Each view serves a different purpose to help you stay organized and efficient across your projects.
exploreViews.tip: Try moving a project between different stages in board view!

completion.title: Great! You're Ready to Manage Projects
completion.description: You've mastered the project management interface. Use these views to keep your work organized.
completion.tableView: Sort and filter the detailed table view
